attributes.action: Diane Abbott Should Resign Over Racist Comments
attributes.additional_details: Diane Abbott says that Divide and Rule is a tactic of "White People" she claims it was taken out of context but its twitter there is no context. The days when racism can only be perpetrated by whites are over. Lets show our commitment to true equality by preventing the Diane Abbots of this world from having a publicly funded platform from which to promote her hateful and divisive opinions.
